DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare treatment teriparatide raloxifene teriparatide alone . The study evaluate side effect may associate two drug may help determine whether teriparatide raloxifene together help patient osteoporosis teriparatide alone .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Use Teriparatide Raloxifene Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Must diagnose osteoporosis . Must female , age 45 85 . Must least 5 year postmenopausal . Must free severe chronically disable condition . Must able properly use injection device . Exclusion Criteria Must bone diseases osteoporosis . Must history certain cancer . Must certain medical disease ( inflammatory bowel disease , malabsorption syndrome , kidney bladder stone , venous thrombus embolus , recent vaginal bleeding due unknown cause ) . Must take currently take certain type medicine . Must know allergy study agent SERM .
